name: Name
headphonesText:
The headphones are active noise canceling for immersive sound and all-day comfort. Transparent mode, in which you can hear the surroundings
              peace. Sweat and water resistant. Three sizes of soft earbuds are included for custom fit.
music: Active noise canceling blocks outside noise so you can fully immerse yourself in your music
transparent: Transparent mode allows you to hear the world around you
technology: Spatial audio technology with dynamic head tracking creates a truly vibrant and immersive sound experience
adaptive: Adaptive EQ automatically adjusts the sound to suit you
eartips: Soft silicone eartips with conical cavity; three sizes to choose from
